answers.answer: I get the same way and I'm 7 months its because your heart is pumping more blood to the baby.

Im the same way.. I normally have a very fast heartbeat 90-110..during pregnancy it gets even higher 105-125 just walking.. my doctor has never said anything and this is my 4th pregnancy.  Good luck :) oh im 6.5 months as well :)
Hi i have a cuestion im 34 weeks pregnant and I have gestational diabetes and im gegning way so fast is any chance I can get induced has any of you moms ben throw something like it,im worried :(
Ir is normal to have an increased heart rate during pregnancy. I asked my Dr because I noticed mine would sometimes be over 90 while resting. It has to do with the increase in blood volume.
Thank you very much, ladies! You've eased my mind

question: My resting heart rate is anywhere in between 80-100bpm but after walking through the grocery store is gets up to 115bpm. I deal with anxiety big time so even "resting" I'm anxious. Should I be worried about these numbers? Some days I can feel my heart pounding in my chest all throughout the day. That scares me too. I'm obsessing over it and I'm not sure if that's my problem too. I just want to know if anyone else has dealt with this and if getting over 100 when just walking through a store while pregnant is normal? I'm almost 6.5 months preg.
title: Pregnancy Heart Rate...
